title: Ethical and Pedagogical Gamification Design: Short-Intensive Course for Social Studies Application

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Knowledge of Secondary Social Studies Curriculum and Foundational Understanding of Instructional Design
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service and in-service teachers to enhance gamification design competencies within social studies contexts. Strengthening accessibility and practicality through smartphone-based mobile learning

learning_goals: Classify positive/negative educational effects of gamification and apply them to practical cases
Design three or more ethically aligned gamification elements suitable for social studies contexts
Explain competition mechanism adjustment strategies to enhance collaborative learning environments
Implement and validate a gamification design model through project-based assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
